data.name: Puzzle Soccer
data.detailed_description:
Puzzle Soccer is a board game that mixes memory game mechanics, territory conquest and grid movement in order to score a goal.

The match takes place in turns and follows the sequence below:

1) You turn over a card from the deck
2) You choose one of your players
3) According to the pattern drawn on the chosen card, you decide to move your player or kick the ball
4) You must place one of your players in the on-goal kick region
5) And finally must kick to score the goal before time runs out

Every move made with one of your players consumes game time and if the time runs out the game is over. Kicking the ball doesn't take time, but if it touches an opponent it will kick it away.

Have fun with this game that is a real strategy challenge for those who love football.
data.about_the_game:
Puzzle Soccer is a board game that mixes memory game mechanics, territory conquest and grid movement in order to score a goal.

The match takes place in turns and follows the sequence below:

1) You turn over a card from the deck
2) You choose one of your players
3) According to the pattern drawn on the chosen card, you decide to move your player or kick the ball
4) You must place one of your players in the on-goal kick region

Every move made with one of your players consumes game time and if the time runs out the game is over. Kicking the ball doesn't take time, but if it touches an opponent it will kick it away.

Have fun with this game that is a real strategy challenge for those who love football.
data.short_description: It's not enough to be the fastest nor the most skillful player, sometimes you must to be the smartest one! Use your memory power and strategic ability to move your players in the correct order to score the goal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
